short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decode network responses from the Internet Computer blockchain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The must-have Chrome extension for IC web devs. This extension adds a Chrome devtools tab, which properly decodes responses from canisters (smart contracts) and provides lots of useful debugging information.

- Readable request and response payloads for all canisters, regardless of candid interface availability
- Canister metadata such as title, description, etc.
- Canister interface and subnet
- Timing data to assess duration of update messages

Report issues, request features and contribute at https://github.com/jorgenbuilder/chrome-dfinity-decoder/issues and reach the developer at https://twitter.com/Jorgenbuilder
